findings.title: Contracts cannot transfer ownership
findings.description: The contracts ERC20MintBurnProxied and ERC20FixedSupplyProxied cannot transfer ownership as they do not inherit from ContractOwnershipBase.

findings.title: Contract Remains Paused After setMerkleRoot()
findings.description: The contract remains paused after setMerkleRoot() has been called and needs to be unpaused manually by sending another unpause() transaction.

findings.title: Redundant imports and library usage
findings.description: Redundant import and usage of libraries such as ERC20Storage, ContractOwnershipBase, ERC20MetadataStorage, and ERC20PermitStorage.

findings.title: Missing documentation
findings.description: Should document that users need to provide implementation for `_distributePayout()`.
